about_the_game:
If you enjoy playing Nova Lands and want to show your support for the game's development, we have an exciting collection of bonus content for you!
As a thank you, you'll receive several items to add a dash of charm to your gaming experience :)

New skins for your little pet-companions


Cute pet skins to make your interplanetary journey even more adorable!

New ways to decorate your house


Exclusive decorations that add a touch of Steam-inspired charm to your in-game house!

Nova Lands - Original Soundtrack


This music will make your interstellar adventure to immerse yourself in the game's music!

Track List:

  • 1. Dancing Is Not Science (7:21)
  • 2. 47.867u (6:48)
  • 3. No Gravity // Interlude (0:57)
  • 4. Machinewerk (5:46)
  • 5. Nova Lands Theme (4:31)
  • 6. Bossinha Trip // Interlude (1:33)
  • 7. Boss Fight (5:43)
  • 8. Underneath (5:02)
  • 9. Antork Said Goodbye // Roinc (1:10)

Help us keep Nova Lands thriving and upgrade your adventure today!

name: Nova Lands - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Supporter Pack includes unique decorations for your in-game house, adorable pet skins, and the complete game soundtrack.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Thai, Vietnamese, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, German, Korean, Traditional Chinese
